Class RunGameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.RunGameEngine

  • public class RunGameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    It contains logic for executing GameEngine

    • Method Detail

      • loadMap

        public GameMap loadMap(java.lang.String p_mapName)
        Load map for playing the game. It checks whether map file exist or not.
        Parameters:
        p_mapName - name of the map to be used for playing the game.
        Returns:
        l_gameMap represents the existing map to be used for playing the game.

      • editMap

        public GameMap editMap(java.lang.String p_mapName)
        Load map for editing if it exist. If the map file does not exist, creates a new GameMap object to add information.
        Parameters:
        p_mapName - Name of the map to be searched/created
        Returns:
        l_gameMap represents the existing map or null value if new one is to be created

      • addContinent

        public boolean addContinent(GameMap p_map,
                            java.lang.String p_continentID,
                            int p_continentValue)
        Add continent with given name and control value if it is valid and does not exist. Invalid if continent already exists.
        Parameters:
        p_map - the map to which continent is to be added
        p_continentID - ID of the continent to be added
        p_continentValue - Continent value of the continent to be added
        Returns:
        true if successful, else false indicating invalid command

      • removeContinent

        public boolean removeContinent(GameMap p_map,
                               java.lang.String p_continentID)
        Remove the continent and all the countries present in that continent. Remove neighboring node for all the countries that are being removed.
        Parameters:
        p_map - represent the map being edited
        p_continentID - ID of the continent to be removed
        Returns:
        true if successful, else false indicating invalid command

      • addCountry

        public boolean addCountry(GameMap p_map,
                          java.lang.String p_countryID,
                          java.lang.String p_continentID)
        Add country with given name to the corresponding given continent in the map if it is valid. Invalid if country already exists.
        Parameters:
        p_map - map to which country is to be added
        p_countryID - ID of the country which is to be added
        p_continentID - ID of the continent to which new country is added.
        Returns:
        true if successful, else false indicating invalid command

      • removeCountry

        public boolean removeCountry(GameMap p_map,
                             java.lang.String p_countryID)
        Remove the country and remove all its neighbors.
        Parameters:
        p_map - represent the map being edited
        p_countryID - ID of the country to be removed
        Returns:
        true if successful, else false indicating invalid command

      • addNeighbor

        public boolean addNeighbor(GameMap p_map,
                           java.lang.String p_countryID,
                           java.lang.String p_neighborCountryID)
        Adds link between the two argument countries and made the neighbor.
        Parameters:
        p_map - represent map being edited
        p_countryID - ID of one argument country
        p_neighborCountryID - ID of other argument country
        Returns:
        true if successful, else false indicating invalid command

      • removeNeighbor

        public boolean removeNeighbor(GameMap p_map,
                              java.lang.String p_countryID,
                              java.lang.String p_neighborCountryID)
        Removes the link between the two neighboring Country
        Parameters:
        p_map - represent map being edited
        p_countryID - ID of one argument country
        p_neighborCountryID - ID of other argument country
        Returns:
        true if successful, else false indicating invalid command

      • showMap

        public void showMap(GameMap p_map)
        print the continents, countries and each country's neighbor in the map
        Parameters:
        p_map - the map to be shown.

      • saveMap

        public boolean saveMap(GameMap p_map,
                       java.lang.String p_fileName)
        save GameMap as ".map" file using Domination game format.
        Parameters:
        p_map - The map to be saved
        p_fileName - name of the file
        Returns:
        true if successful, else false indicating invalid command

      • validateMap

        public boolean validateMap(GameMap p_map)
        It consist of various validity checks to ensure that map is suitable for playing the game. Checks: 1) any empty continent is present or not, i.e. continent without any country 2) map for the game is connected graph or not 3) each continent in map is a connected sub-graph or not
        Parameters:
        p_map - GameMap to be be checked.
        Returns:
        return true if map is valid, else false indicate invalid map
